condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: 2.3 Governance and managerial capacity of institutions are enhanced to effectively plan, budget, deliver, monitor education services (formal and non formal).

description.narrative: UNICEF provided support to the MoE and its institutions through direct deployments, capacity building interventions, and collecting evidence or knowledge generation to enhance the MoE's ability to use its systems for data collection, evidence-based programme planning, implementation support, and policy. | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:17/01/2020

title.narrative: Policies institutionalized, studies and strategies implemented/published by the MEHE [previously Output Indicator 2.3.b: Appropriate national curricula, frameworks, standards, and policies reviewed and endorsed]

baseline.value: ALP and Prep-ECE programmes currently endorsed Existing teaching curriculum framework Uniform protocols and mechanisms to monitor child (and gender-based) violence do not exist

target.value: 2020:Policy documents on the institutionalization of TTCM are available / The inter-ministerial National Strategy on Child Marriage in Education is implemented / A national Strategy/Policy on Inclusive Education is validated by the MEHE/study on gender dimension is published/A baseline study on public school teachers in Lebanon is published

baseline.value: Comprehensive data on OOSC in Lebanon unavailable Evaluation of UNICEF AWPs with MEHE as yet not undertaken Information on barriers to access and retention not comprehensively documented Lack of su

actual.value: 2020:The report is in the review phases
